ACCOUNT.MSG_ACCOUNT_CREATED_SUCCESSFUL: Account created successfully. Your credentials have been emailed to your email address.
ACCOUNT.MSG_CREDENTIALS_EMAILED: Your credentials have been emailed to your email address.
ACCOUNT.MSG_POBOX_LINKED_SUCCESS: The P.O. Box is now linked to your online account. Please sign out and sign in again to check this P.O.Box.
ACCOUNT.MSG_POBOX_UNLINKED_SUCCESS: The P.O. Box has now been unlinked from your online account. Please sign out and sign in again to check this P.O.Box.
ACCOUNT.INFO_MSG_PROFILEUPDATED: Your profile information has been updated

POBOX.MSG_POBOX_RENTAL_ORDER_PLACED: {POBOXNUMBER} Po Box rental order has been placed.
POBOX.MSG_POBOX_RENEWAL_ORDER_PLACED: {POBOXNUMBER} Po Box renewal order has been placed.
POBOX.MSG_NO_AREA: No Areas with free boxes available

individual.title: My Home 1
features: Delivering and receiving mail 1 times a week at villa doorstep*
Accessing the P.O. Box online (automated sorted ordinary mail)
“eshaar” sms notification on received registered mail, parcels and express mail
Retaining the P.O. Box number in case of change of villa location
individual.footnote: *This is exclusively available for villa type houses only in selected areas

individual.title: My Home 2
features: Delivering and receiving mail 2 times a week at villa doorstep*
Accessing the P.O. Box online (automated sorted ordinary mail)
“eshaar” sms notification on received registered mail, parcels and express mail
Retaining the P.O. Box number in case of change of villa location
individual.footnote: *This is exclusively available for villa type houses only in selected areas

individual.title: My Building
features: Delivering mail within residential buildings.
Accessing the P.O. Box online (automated sorted ordinary mail).
Eshaar sms notification on received registered mail, parcels and express mail.

individual.title: My Zone
features: Delivering mail through P.O. Box shelters located in residential and commercial areas
Accessing the P.O. Box online (automated sorted ordinary mail)
Eshaar sms notification on received registered mail, parcels and express mail.

individual.title: My Box
features: Delivering mail through P.O. Box at Post Offices.
Accessing the P.O. Box online (automated sorted ordinary mail).
Eshaar sms notification on received registered mail, parcels and express mail.
